where m.email = #{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and i.document_submit = 'Y' order by no desc

FROM result_table r join employees e on r.employee_id = e.employee_id join employees e2 on r.approver_id = e2.employee_id join common_code c on r.document_check = c.code_value join common_code c2 on e2.position = c2.code_value join common_code c3 on e.position = c3.code_value
